column6:
The townhouse is located in the Rice Military/Heights area where you have walking access to restaurants and bars. It is also very close to Memorial Park and other parks. 

Its about 2 to 3 miles from Downtown. 25 minutes drive from Airport (in Texas that is close). Its also very close to I-10 expressway that will connect you to other expressways and big road.

You will have to a private bath to your own room with a comfortable queen size bed. 

Suitable for singles, couples, and business.
column9: Private Room with Private Bath in a Quiet Townhous
